entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FileSystemWatcher_InternalBufferSize_SynchronizingObject test failed in CI #103495
  • GC/Regressions/v2.0-beta2/452950 failed in CI #103494
  • Linux Arm64 Release build cannot unwind the `MethodTable::GetNativeSize` function #103489
  • [release/6.0-staging] Ensure the single-job-per-target-based official build produces all the correct assets #103485
    6.0.x
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests failure on CI #103482
  • System.Formats.Nrbf lacks a package readme #103481
    9.0.0
  • Crash when disposing an EventListener during shutdown #103480
  • BinaryFormatTests.FormatterTests.BinaryFormatterTests.ValidateAgainstBlobs test failure on CI #103478
  • Optimization removes necessary code #103477
  • [mobile] Overview of mobile related CI failures #103472
    9.0.0
  • Cryptographic cryptoTransform.TransformFinalBlock() Throws Exception "Padding is invalid and cannot be removed" when data is passed in chunks #103470
  • Add a DirectoryPath property to DirectoryNotFoundException to be consistent with FileNotFoundException #103468
  • SslStream Custom Algorithm Support #103466
    Future
  • [RISC-V] Re-enable WriteXorExecute on riscv64 architecture. #103465
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Create and convenience APIs for System.Numerics types #103464
    9.0.0
  • NegotiateAuthentication.ComputeIntegrityCheck on Windows sets an invalid QOP #103461
    Future
  • TimeProviderTests.TestProviderTimer failed in CI #103459
  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.File_GetSetTimes_SafeFileHandle_Pathless.WritingShouldUpdateWriteTime_After_SetLastAccessTime #103457
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Revert unintentional nullability changes and fix inconsistencies in StringContent ctrs #83423
    9.0.0
  • Race in Socket.BeginSendTo #30804
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add missing BigMul overload for uint x uint -> ulong #98346
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add File.WriteAllBytes taking ReadOnlySpan<byte> #99823
    9.0.0
  • [7.0] Test failure in Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_AllocatingSpan.Decrypt_Pkcs1_ErrorsForInvalidPadding #99652
  • [Mono] Build fails with libcdacreader.so missing from manifest #103486
  • LSRA: Add support to track more than 64 registers #99658
    9.0.0
  • BinaryFormatter PayloadReader API #102014
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a generic OrderedDictionary class #24826
    9.0.0
  • Referencing assemblies produced by PersistedAssemblyBuilder generates a System.Private.CoreLib compiler error #103357
  • Mono is unable to find assemblies named with some international characters #103276
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Consolidate <NativeAotSupported definitions (#103273)" #103497
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Extend SearchValues<string> use in Regex to NonBacktracking #103496
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix Array.Initialize for big MD arrays #103493
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Consider block weights instead of `BBF_RUN_RARELY` flag in `fgMoveColdBlocks` #103492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add a line stating that debugger scenario is not yet supported #103491
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [PERF] Update the artifact path for the maui benchmarks app #103483
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Clone for IncrementalHash and KMAC #103479
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fix the flakiness of new BinaryFormatter tests #103476
    area-System.Resources, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix assembly name parser to accommodate non-ASCII UTF8 strings #103475
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • mark all BinaryFormatter-related tests as conditional #103471
    needs-area-label, binary-serialization
  • [LoongArch64] Implement 'JIT_GetDynamicNonGCStaticBase_SingleAppDomain', 'JIT_GetDynamicGCStaticBase_SingleAppDomain' after PR#99183. #103467
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Make it possible for featuredefault substitutions to only apply at publish time #103463
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Expose various new Create and conversion APIs for the Vector types #103462
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Span.StartsWith(T) and EndsWith(T) #103458
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Fix linux arm64 release build #103490
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Mark StringContent mediaType parameters as nullable #103442
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Expose the BigMul APIs publicly #103455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add File.Append/WriteAllText/Bytes{Async} overloads for span/memory #103308
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Exclude cdacreader from mono packs #103488
    area-Setup, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #103260
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • remove use of a term flagged by tooling #103487
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Handle more than 64 registers - The finale #103387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: gathervector extends #103370
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Revert #102862 to unblock the official build #103484
    Servicing-approved, blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Make System.Formats.Nrbf public #103232
    area-System.Security, binary-serialization
  • [RISC-V] Disable EnableWriteXorExecute by default on riscv64 architectue #103408
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Do not set UseNativeAotForComponents for arm32 MUSL #103469
    needs-area-label
  • clrinterp: Add missing must-expand intrinsics #103326
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add OrderedDictionary #103309
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use ThrowHelper in Queue<T> #103424
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Set UseNativeAotForComponents to false on bionic #103454
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Point to DMI.Create from RUC message on StackFrame.GetMethod #103400
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fold identical method bodies in the compiler #101969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Move the thread alloc context off of Thread in CoreCLR #103055
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Arm64/SVE: Implement ConvertToInt32 and ConvertToUInt32 for double #103436
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2474449 #103348
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface.GetThreadData #103324
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move the working BinaryFormatter implementation to a NuGet package #103255
    area-System.Runtime, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Optimize casts from constant byrefs #99130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove the OCSP nonce #103446
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • JIT: Move targets of hot jumps to create fallthrough post-RPO layout #102927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Backport fix for MethodImpl removal when interfaceImpl is removed #103432
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • [Android] Allow using installed certificates for client authentication in SslStream #103337
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • update proxy setting on registry changes #103364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add ILLink option to preserve symbol paths #103295
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Validate generic constraints in ILLink tests #103452
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • match IPv4MappedToIPv6 address in IPv4 networks #103381
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add JsonSchemaExporter. #103322
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix VS issue with unhandled exception on secondary threads #103425
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix handling SECBUFFER_EXTRA with renegotiation after handshake. #103419
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [HTTP/3] Wrap Cancelled Request with OCE instead of QuicException #103081
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Cleanup some handling around Avx10v1 #103241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Obsolete ServicePointManager 🎉 #103456
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete some unused cmake defines #103441
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Move hardcoded `_BoolPropertiesThatTriggerRelinking` to `wasm-props.json` included in the runtime pack #103422
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Bundle assets inside of wasm file #103160
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] change instructions in IMAGE_REL_LOONGARCH64_PC & fix genCodeForJumpCompare #103399
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix DynamicInvokeMethodThunk hash code collisions #103274
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't report dependency on canonical forms just because there's GVMs #103331
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HybridGlobalization] Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103226
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-browser
  • Use LTO for linux as well #103058
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge 1ES templates #103366
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix zombie LDAP results retriever thread #102526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
